label: Document Type
description:
account: information to fill in a chart of accounts file. 
balance: the results of accumulation of a complete and validated list of entries for an account (or a list of account) in a specific period - sometimes called general ledger 
entries:  a list of individual accounting entries, which might be posted/validated or nonposted/validated  
journal: a self-balancing (Dr = Cr) list of entries for a specific period including beginning balance for that period.  
ledger: a complete list of entries for a specific account (or list of accounts) for a specific period; note - debits do not have to equal credits.   
assets: a listing of open receivables, payables, inventory, fixed assets or other information that can be extracted from but are not necessarily included as part of a journal entry.  
trialBalance: the self-balancing (Dr = Cr) result of accumulation of a complete and validated list of entries for the entity in a complete list of accounts in a specific period. 
taxtables:  aids automated interpretation of instances that represent tax tables; Tax table are defined by using multiple [taxes] structures to gather the population of codes, authorities and rates; through [taxTableCode] cross-references in the [taxes] structure, these "master file" tax tables can be referenced. 
Often sorted by date or by account, these terms have specific, and sometimes different, meanings in different areas. Common practice will drive accounting method/term matches.
description-ja:
・科目:科目体系ファイルの情報。
・残高:特定の期間について、勘定科目(または勘定科目リスト)の、完了し検証された仕訳リストの累算結果。時に総勘定元帳と呼ばれる。
・仕訳:個々の勘定記入のリスト。転記/検証されていることもあり、されていないこともある。
・仕訳帳:特定の期間における、その期間の開始残高を含む貸借が一致(Dr=Cr)した仕訳のリスト 。
・元帳:特定の期間における特定の勘定科目(または勘定科目リスト)についての、仕訳の全リスト 。注意－貸借が一致する必要はない。
・資産:仕訳記入の一部として必ずしも含まれていないが、そこから抽出可能な売掛金、買掛金、在庫、固定資産、その他の情報のリスト。
・試算表:事業体に対する、特定期間の全勘定科目リストでの、完了し検証された仕訳リストの、貸借が一致（Dr=Cr)した累算結果。
・税率表:税率表をあらわすデータを自動的に解釈できるようにする。税率表は、コード、税務当局情報、レートをあらわす複数のtaxes構造データを使って定義される。taxTableCodeはtaxes構造データ内で相互に参照されるが、これらのマスタファイルが参照可能。
多くの場合、日付または科目によりソートされる。会計処理方法や用語は慣行により適合させる。
[設定値のリスト]
(account：科目)、(balance：残高)、(entries：仕訳)、(journal：仕訳帳)、(ledger：元帳)、(assets：資産)、(trialbalance：試算表)、(taxtables：税率表)、(other：その他)

label-ja: 会計士担当者地位/役職
description-ja: 会計士の担当者の地位や役職\n

label: Contact Phone
description: Phone Number for Accountant Contact
description-ja: 会計士の担当者の電話番号\n

label: Accountant Contact Phone Number Description
description: Accountant Contact Phone Number Description such as Main, Investor relations, etc.
label-ja: 会計士担当者電話番号説明
description-ja: 代表、IR用などの、会計士の担当者の電話番号の説明。\n[設定値のリスト]\n(bookkeeper：記帳係)、(controller：会計責任者)、(direct：直通)、(fax：FAX)、(investor-relations：IR担当者)、(main：代表)、(switchboard：交換台)、(other：その他)

label: Accountant Contact Phone Number
description: Accountant Contact phone number referred to in the description.
label-ja: 会計士担当者電話番号
description-ja: 説明で示される会計士の担当者の電話番号。\n

label: Contact Fax Number Structure
description: Accountant Contact Fax Number Structure
description-ja: 会計士の担当者のFAX番号の構造体。

label: Accountant Contact Fax Number
description: Accountant Contact Fax Number
description-ja: 会計士の担当者のFAX番号。

label: Accountant Contact Fax Number Usage
description: Accountant Contact Fax Number Usage (e.g. orders, head office, IR)
label-ja: 会計士担当者FAX番号用途
description-ja: 会計士の担当者のFAX番号の用途。(注文、本社、IRなど)\n

label: Contact Email Address Structure
description: Accountant contact E-mail address structure
label-ja: 【会計士担当者Eメールアドレス】
description-ja: 会計士の担当者のEメールアドレスの構造体。

label: Accountant Contact Email Address Usage
description: Accountant Contact email address usage (e.g. orders, head office, IR)
label-ja: 会計士担当者Eメールアドレス用途
description-ja: 会計士の担当者のEメールアドレスの用途。(注文、本社、IRなど)\n

label: Accountant Contact Email Address
description: Accountant Contact email address
label-ja: 会計士担当者Eメールアドレス
description-ja: 会計士の担当者のEメールアドレス。

label: Accountant Contact Type
description: Contact Type for Accountant Contact
description-ja: 会計士の担当者の種別\n

label: Accountant Location ID cross reference
description: This code is used to associate the contact with a specific location for the Accountant. Its value should be the same as that of the accountantAddressLocationIdentifier
label-ja: 会計士所在地相互参照情報
description-ja: 担当者と会計士の所在地情報を関係付けるためのコード。\naccountantAddressLocationIdentifierと同じ値であるべき。

label: Accountant Contact Active
description: Boolean to indicate whether the contact is active (="true") or inactive (="false")
description-ja: 担当者が有効か無効かを示すブール値。

label: Reporting Calendar
description: A tool to collect the periods used to summarise results from transactions.
description-ja: 取引の結果をまとめるための期間を集めるもの。

label: Reporting Calendar Code
description: The code used to identify this specific reporting calendar, unique across periods
label-ja: 報告カレンダーコード
description-ja: この報告カレンダーを識別するコード。複数期間にわたって一意。

label: Reporting Calendar Description
description: A description of the reporting calendar (associated with the reportingCalendarCode given)
description-ja: 報告カレンダーの説明（reportingCalendarCodeと関係付けられる）。

label: Reporting Calendar Title
description: A description of the reporting period. The actual beginning and ending dates are found within the 'reportingCalendarPeriod' structure
label-ja: 報告カレンダータイトル
description-ja: 報告期間の説明。実際の開始日及び終了日はreportingCalendarPeriodに記述する。

label: Code Related to Type of Periods
description: A code for the type of period involved. Enumerated as: monthly, quarterly, semi-annually, 4-5-4, ad-hoc, other.
description-ja:
報告期間の種別コード。月次、四半期ごと、半期ごと、4-5-4、随時、その他
[設定値のリスト]
(monthly：月次)、(quarterly：四半期ごと)、(semi-annually：半期ごと)、(4-5-4：4-5-4)、(ad-hoc：随時)、(other：その他)

label: Description of periods
description: A description of the type of period involved.
description-ja: 報告期間の種別の説明。

label: Closed status
description: An identifier on whether the reporting calendar is still open for activity. enumerated, "open", "closed", "pending"
description-ja:
報告カレンダーがオープンかどうかを示す識別子。オープン、締切り済み、保留中
[設定値のリスト]
(open：オープン)、(closed：締切り済み)、(pending：保留中)

label: Reporting Purpose
description: A description of the accounting set of books involved. Uses enumeration from accounting method purpose.
description-ja: 帳簿の集合の説明。会計処理方法の目的の列挙値を使用する。\n[設定値のリスト]\n(book：帳簿)、(tax：税)、(management：管理)、(statutory：スタチュトリ)、(other：その他)

label: Reporting Purpose Description
description: Free format description of the reporting purpose
description-ja: 報告目的の説明。

label: INVOICING PERIOD
description: A group of business terms providing information on the invoice period.

label: Invoicing period start date
description: The date when the Invoice period starts.

label: Invoicing period end date
description: The date when the Invoice period ends.

label: Reporting Calendar Period
description: A tool to collect a specific set of periods used to summarize results from transactions.
description-ja: 取引の結果をまとめるための特定の期間を集めるもの。

label: Reporting Period Identifier
description: An identifier for this period in this calendar
description-ja: このカレンダーにおけるこの期間の識別子。

label: Period Description
description: A description of this specific reporting period in this calendar.
description-ja: このカレンダーにおけるこの特定の期間の説明。

label: Period Start Date
description: The beginning date/time of a period
description-ja: 期間の開始日付/時刻\n

label: Period End Date
description: The ending date/time of a period
description-ja: 期間の終了日付/時刻\n

label: Period Closed Date
description: The date/time a period has been closed for activity. If this is present with a nill value (xsi:nill="true") then the period is not closed.
description-ja: この期間の活動が締め切られた日付/時刻。この値がニル値(xsi:nill="true")であれば、この期間は、締め切られていない。

label: Entry Information
description: Parent for entry headers/journal entry headers.
description-ja: エントリヘッダー/仕訳記入ヘッダーの親タグ。

label: Date Posted
description: Date this entry was posted (validated) to the general ledger. May not represent the date of accounting significance which is represented by 'postingDate'.
description-ja: この仕訳が総勘定元帳に転記された(検証された)日付。 postingDateで示されるような会計上意味のある日付を表さないかもしれない。

label: Entry Creator
description: Initials/name of operator originally entering.
description-ja: 最初に入力したオペレータのイニシャル/名前。

label: Entry Last Modifier
description: Identification for the last person modifying this entry before posting.
description-ja: 転記前に最後にこの仕訳を修正した者の識別子。

label: Entry Date
description: Represents the actual date/time of entry into computer (automated from system date, often misrepresented by changing system clock). Posting dates are maintained separately.
description-ja: コンピュータへ入力した実際の日付/時刻(システム日付から自動的に与えられ、システム時計の変更により、しばしば誤った値になる)を示す。 転記日付とは別に管理される。

label: Responsible Person
description: Identifier of person who created or originated or is otherwise responsible for the entry.
description-ja: 仕訳を作成したか、仕訳に責任を持つ者の識別子。

label: Source Journal
description:
Source journal. The code of the journal in which the entry is processed. The code must be a unique indication for a journal and is selected from the following enumerated list:
cd      cash disbursements (sending cheques to vendors)
cr      cash receipts (receiving cheques from others)
fa      fixed assets
gi      giro/other bank adjustments
gj      general journal
im      inventory management
jc      job cost
pj      purchase journal (liabilities from purchases)
pl      payroll journal
sj      sales journal
se      standard entries
ud      user defined
ot      other sources of entries"
description-ja:
元仕訳帳。仕訳が処理される仕訳帳のコード。コードは仕訳帳に一意な指標であり、以下から選択する。
出金(仕入先への小切手送付)、入金(他者からの小切手受領)、固定資産、振替、一般仕訳帳、在庫管理、個別原価、仕入帳(仕入による負債)、賃金台帳、売上台帳、通常仕訳、ユーザ定義、その他
[設定値のリスト]
(cd：出金)、(cr：入金)、(fa：固定資産)、(gi：振替)、(gj：一般仕訳帳)、(im：在庫管理)、(jc：個別原価)、(pj：仕入帳)、(pl：賃金台帳)、(sj：売上台帳)、(se：通常仕訳)、(ud：ユーザ定義)、(ot：その他)

label: Journal Description
description: Source journal (full description of general journal, payroll journal, accountant entries). A more easily readable journal indication. The most common journals are: Purchases, Sales, Cash, and General Journal.
description-ja: 元仕訳帳(一般仕訳、給与台帳、会計士入力の完全な説明)。 よりわかりやすい仕訳帳の指標。 最も一般的な仕訳帳は、次の通り。 仕入、売上、現金、一般仕訳。

label: Type Identifier
description: One of the following enumerated list: adjusting, budget, comparative, external-accountant, standard, passed-adjusting, eliminating, proposed, recurring, reclassifying, simulated, tax, other
description-ja:
以下の値のうちのひとつ。
整理、予算、比較、外部会計士、通常、無視、消去、提案、反復、組替、シミュレーション、税、その他
[設定値のリスト]
(adjusting：整理)、(budget：予算)、(comparative：比較)、(external-accountant：外部会計士)、(standard：通常)、(passed-adjusting：無視)、(eliminating：消去)、(proposed：提案)、(recurring：反復)、(reclassifying：組替)、(simulated：シミュレーション)、(tax：税)、(other：その他)

label: Entry Origin
description: Origin of entry: accrual, manual entry, imported entry, exchange gain or loss
description-ja: 仕訳の起源。発生、手入力、インポート入力、為替換算による損益。

label: Entry Identifier
description: Identifier within source journal
description-ja: 元仕訳帳中の識別子。

label: Entry Description
description: Description of entry described by this entry header (e.g. Opening Balance)
description-ja: このエントリヘッダーによって説明された仕訳の説明(例えば、期首残高)\n

label: Entry Qualifier
description: Entry Qualifier - An enumerated field that qualifies the type of entry, specifically useful for general ledger and trial balance environments when it is important to state the values represented are summarized as of the reporting date - opening or closing balances. In accounting systems, this is often known as BBF (balance brought forward.) Permitted values are: standard, balance-brought-forward and other.
description-ja: 仕訳の修飾子。総勘定元帳や試算表で、開始残高や決算残高のように、記された値が報告日で集約されていることを明示することが重要なときに有用な、仕訳の種別を修飾するもの。会計システムにおいて、BBF（繰越残高）として知られるもの。指定可能な値は以下。標準、繰越残高、その他\n[設定値のリスト]\n(standard：標準)、(balance-brought-forward：繰越残高)、(other：その他)

label: Entry Qualifier Description
description: Free format description of the entry qualifier
description-ja: 仕訳の修飾子の説明。

label: Posting Code
description: Code for posting to period, e.g., period 1-13, based on codes in an accounting period file. We do not recommend that software vendors export here, but suggest providing period end numbers for the buckets. Possibilities W1 through W53, M1 through M13, Q1-Q4. Developers and others creating output files are encouraged to supply an actual end date.
description-ja: 転記の期間を表すコード。例えば、会計期間ファイルのコードにもとづく期間１～１３。ソフトウエアベンダーが、この値をエクスポートすることは推奨しない。期間の最終番号を提供することを勧める。可能な値としては、W1からW53、M1からM13、Q1からQ4など。開発者や出力ファイルの作成者には、実際の終了日付を提供することを勧める。

label: Batch ID for Entry Group
description: ID for a batch for this group of entries
description-ja: この仕訳の集合に付ける、束の識別子。

label: Batch Description
description: Description of this batch
description-ja: この仕訳の束の説明。

label: Number of Entries
description: The total number of entries.
description-ja: 仕訳の総数。

label: Total Debits
description: The total of all debit amounts.
description-ja: 借方金額の合計値。

label: Total Credits
description: The total of all credit amounts.
description-ja: 貸方金額の合計値。

label: Type of Difference Between Book and Tax
description: Enumerated field with possible values of permanent, temporary or none indicating the type of difference between book and tax accounting methods. Omission of this field is equivalent to "none"
label-ja: 帳簿価税務簿価差異種別
description-ja: 帳簿と税務会計処理方法との差異の種別を示す値。永久か一時的かまたは無し。値の省略時は「無し」と同じ。\n[設定値のリスト]\n(permanent：永久)、(temporary：一時的)、(none：無し)

label: Elimination Code
description: Informs destination ledger this is an intracompany entry which eliminates in consolidation
description-ja: 連結決算時に消去される連結会社間仕訳であることを、受取側の元帳に通知する。

label: Budget Scenario Period Start
description: Start of period covered by associated budgetScenario
label-ja: 予算シナリオ期間開始日付
description-ja: 関係付けられたbudgetScenarioがカバーする期間の開始日。

label: Budget Scenario Period End
description: End of period covered by associated budgetScenario
label-ja: 予算シナリオ期間終了日付
description-ja: 関係付けられたbudgetScenarioがカバーする期間の終了日。

label: Scenario Description
description: Text related to budgetScenario
description-ja: budgetScenarioに関する記述。

label: Scenario Code
description: Code for a budget scenario identifier (such as PB for 'preliminary budget', or RB for 'revised budget', or other identifier for entryType)
description-ja: 予算シナリオの識別コード。例えば、「PB」（予備予算）、「RB」（補正予算）、または他の仕訳種別の識別子。

label: Budget Allocation Code
description: Code associated with the calculation formula: e.g. (D)ivide by number of periods, (T)otal for period given
description-ja: 計算式に関係付けられたコード。例えば、期間数での分割、与えられた期間の合計\n[設定値のリスト]\n(D：期間数での分割)、(T：与えられた期間の合計)

label: ID for Reversing, Standard or Master Entry
description: For standard, reversing, master, cancelling or other entries an ID associated with those entries.
label-ja: 反対/通常/マスタ仕訳識別子
description-ja: 通常、反対、マスタ、取消または他の仕訳のための、それらの仕訳を関連付けるID。

label: Recurring Standard Description
description: Description to accompany standard or recurring ID
description-ja: 通常仕訳または反復仕訳のIDの説明。

label: Frequency Interval
description: For standard or recurring journals, how often entry may be made: every frequencyInterval frequencyUnit, such as every 7 (interval) days (unit) or every 1 (interval) quarter (unit). This field represents the interval.\n
description-ja: 通常または反復仕訳において、仕訳が記入される頻度。frequencyInterval、frequencyUnitごと、たとえば7(interval)日(unit)ごと、1(interval)四半期(unit)ごとなどにおける、intervalを示す。

label: Frequency Unit
description: For standard or recurring journals, how often entry may be made: every frequencyInterval frequencyUnit, such as every 7 (interval) days (unit) or every 1 (interval) quarter (unit). This field represents the unit.\n
description-ja: 通常または反復仕訳において、仕訳が記入される頻度。frequencyInterval、frequencyUnitごと、たとえば7(interval)日(unit)ごと、1(interval)四半期(unit)ごとなどにおける、unitを示す。

label: Repetitions Remaining
description: Number of times that the recurring entry will repeat
description-ja: 反復仕訳の繰り返し予定数。

label: Next Date Repeat
description: Date next repeated or standard posted
description-ja: 次回の反復あるいは通常の転記日。

label: Last Date Repeat
description: Date last repeated or standard posted
description-ja: 前回の反復あるいは通常の転記日。

label: End Date of Repeating Entry
description: For standard or recurring journals, stop date/time for repetitive entry.
description-ja: 通常仕訳または反復仕訳のための、反復入力の終了日付/時刻。

label: Reverse
description: Should entry be reversed?
description-ja: 仕訳が取り消されるべきか。

label: Reversing Date
description: Date this entry should be reversed
description-ja: この仕訳が取り消されるべき日付。

label: Entry Number Counter
description: Unique reference for the entry - a numeric counter
description-ja: 仕訳の一意なリファレンス　　カウンタ

label: INVOICE NOTE
description: A group of business terms providing textual notes that are relevant for the invoice, together with an indication of the note subject.

label: Invoice note subject code
description: The subject of the textual note in BT-22.

label: Invoice note
description: A group of business terms providing textual notes that are relevant for the invoice, together with an indication of the note subject.

label: PROCESS CONTROL
description: A group of business terms providing information on the business process and rules applicable to the Invoice document.

label: Business process type
description: Identifies the business process context in which the transaction appears, to enable the Buyer to process the Invoice in an appropriate way.

label: Specification identifier
description: An identification of the specification containing the total set of rules regarding semantic content, cardinalities and business rules to which the data contained in the instance document conforms.

label: PRECEDING INVOICE REFERENCE
description: A group of business terms providing information on one or more preceding Invoices.

label: Seller trading name
description: A name by which the Seller is known, other than Seller name (also known as Business name].

label: Seller additional legal information
description: Additional legal information relevant for the Seller.

label: Seller address line 3
description: An additional address line in an address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line.

label: Buyer trading name
description: A name by which the Buyer is known, other than Buyer name (also known as Business name).

label: Buyer address line 3
description: An additional address line in an address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line.

label: Tax representative address line 3
description: An additional address line in an address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line.

label: Deliver to address line 3
description: An additional address line in an address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line.

label: PAYMENT INSTRUCTIONS
description: A group of business terms providing information about the payment.

label: Payment means text
description: The means, expressed as text, for how a payment is expected to be or has been settled.

label: Remittance information
description: A textual value used to establish a link between the payment and the Invoice, issued by the Seller.

label: CREDIT TRANSFER
description: A group of business terms to specify credit transfer payments.

label: Payment account identifier
description: A unique identifier of the financial payment account, at a payment service provider, to which payment should be made.

label: Payment account name
description: The name of the payment account, at a payment service provider, to which payment should be made.

label: Payment service provider identifier
description: An identifier for the payment service provider where a payment account is located.

label: PAYMENT CARD INFORMATION
description: A group of business terms providing information about card used for payment contemporaneous with invoice issuance.

label: Payment card primary account number
description: The Primary Account Number (PAN) of the card used for payment.

label: Payment card holder name
description: The name of the payment card holder.

label: DIRECT DEBIT
description: A group of business terms to specify a direct debit.

label: Mandate reference identifier
description: Unique identifier assigned by the Payee for referencing the direct debit mandate.

label: Bank assigned creditor identifier
description: Unique banking reference identifier of the Payee or Seller assigned by the Payee or Seller bank.

label: Debited account identifier
description: The account to be debited by the direct debit.

label: DOCUMENT LEVEL ALLOWANCES
description: A group of business terms providing information about allowances applicable to the Invoice as a whole.

label: Document level allowance base amount
description: The base amount that may be used, in conjunction with the document level allowance percentage, to calculate the document level allowance amount.

label: Document level allowance percentage
description: The percentage that may be used, in conjunction with the document level allowance base amount, to calculate the document level allowance amount.

label: Document level allowance reason
description: The reason for the document level allowance, expressed as text

label: Document level allowance reason code
description: The reason for the document level allowance, expressed as a code.

label: DOCUMENT LEVEL CHARGES
description: A group of business terms providing information about charges and taxes other than VAT, applicable to the Invoice as a whole.

label: Document level charge base amount
description: The base amount that may be used, in conjunction with the document level charge percentage, to calculate the document level charge amount.

label: Document level charge percentage
description: The percentage that may be used, in conjunction with the document level charge base amount, to calculate the document level charge amount

label: Document level charge reason
description: The reason for the document level charge, expressed as text.

label: Document level charge reason code
description: The reason for the document level charge, expressed as a code.

label: DOCUMENT TOTALS
description: A group of business terms providing the monetary totals for the Invoice.

label: Sum of Invoice line net amount
description: Sum of all Invoice line net amounts in the Invoice.

label: Sum of allowances on document level
description: Sum of all allowances on document level in the Invoice.

label: Sum of charges on document level
description: Sum of all charges on document level in the Invoice.

label: Invoice total amount without VAT
description: The total amount of the Invoice without VAT.

label: Invoice total VAT amount in accounting currency
description: The VAT total amount expressed in the accounting currency accepted or required in the country of the Seller.

label: Invoice total amount with VAT
description: The total amount of the Invoice with VAT.

label: Paid amount
description: The sum of amounts which have been paid in advance.

label: Rounding amount
description: The amount to be added to the invoice total to round the amount to be paid.

label: Amount due for payment
description: The outstanding amount that is requested to be paid.

label: VAT BREAKDOWN
description: A group of business terms providing information about VAT breakdown by different categories, rates and exemption reasons

label: VAT category taxable amount
description: Sum of all taxable amounts subject to a specific VAT category code and VAT category rate (if the VAT category rate is applicable].

label: VAT category tax amount
description: The total VAT amount for a given VAT category.

label: VAT category code
description: Coded identification of a VAT category.

label: VAT category rate
description: The VAT rate, represented as percentage that applies for the relevant VAT category.

label: VAT exemption reason text
description: A textual statement of the reason why the amount is exempted from VAT or why no VAT is being charged

label: VAT exemption reason code
description: A coded statement of the reason for why the amount is exempted from VAT.

label: ADDITIONAL SUPPORTING DOCUMENTS
description: A group of business terms providing information about additional supporting documents substantiating the claims made in the Invoice.

label: Supporting document reference
description: An identifier of the supporting document.

label: Supporting document description
description: A description of the supporting document

label: External document location
description: The URL (Uniform Resource Locator) that identifies where the external document is located.

label: Attached document
description: An attached document embedded as binary object or sent together with the invoice.

label: Attached document Mime code
description: The mime code of the attached document.

label: Attached document Filename
description: The file name of the attached document

label: Value added tax point date code
description: The code of the date when the VAT becomes accountable for the Seller and for the Buyer.

label: Invoiced object identifier
description: An identifier for an object on which the invoice is based, given by the Seller.

label: Entry Detail
description: Parent for entry detail
description-ja: 仕訳明細の親タグ。

label: Line Number
description: Identifier for a particular entry detail\n
description-ja: 仕訳明細の識別子。

label: Line Number Counter
description: Unique reference for the line - a numeric counter
description-ja: 明細行の一意なリファレンス　　カウンタ

label: Invoice line net amount
description: The total amount of the Invoice line.

label: INVOICE LINE PERIOD
description: A group of business terms providing information about the period relevant for the Invoice line.

label: Invoice line period start date
description: The date when the Invoice period for this Invoice line starts.

label: Invoice line period end date
description: The date when the Invoice period for this Invoice line ends.

label: Account Identifier
description:
Tuple: parent container for account numbers and identifiers. No entry is made here, but each detail line may have multiple accounts assigned to it for reporting in different GAAPs, offsetting accounts in Japan, passing along information to consolidation systems about local versus consolidating accounts, etc. For example, the account 4783HG-QOWI-192837-1000 may be expressed so: 
/account/accountMainID 1000  
/account/accountMainDescription Cash  
/account/accountSub/accountSubID 4783HG  
/account/accountSub/accountSubDescription Department  
/account/accountSub/accountSubID QOWI  
/account/accountSub/accountSubDescription Branch  
/account/accountSub/accountSubID 192837  
/account/accountSub/accountSubDescription Division
description-ja: タプル。勘定科目番号と識別子の親コンテナ。 ここには記入されないが、個々の明細行は、異なるGAAPでの報告や、日本の見返勘定や、連結勘定科目に対する個別情報の連結会計システムへの伝達などのための、複数の勘定科目を持ちうる。例えば、勘定科目4783HG-QOWI-192837-1000は、次のように表現されうる。\n/account/accountMainID 1000  /account/accountMainDescription Cash  /account/accountSub/accountSubID 4783HG  /account/accountSub/accountSubDescription Department  /account/accountSub/accountSubID QOWI  /account/accountSub/accountSubDescription Branch  /account/accountSub/accountSubID 192837  /account/accountSub/accountSubDescription Division

label: Main Account Number
description: Main account - the code used to identify the accounting bucket the entry has been assigned to. Examples might be 1000 for Cash, 567GAAZ for Sales Expense or Z for tax payments. Identifiers such as department, branch, division, manager, or other modifiers are noted in the Subaccount area. Before needing to post, account is not necessary. Posting to the general ledger almost always requires an entry here.
description-ja: 主勘定科目。仕訳が関連する会計バケットを特定するためのコード。例えば、現金を表す1000、販売費を表す567GAAZ、税を表すZ。\n部門、支店、事業部、マネージャ、その他の識別子は、Subaccount領域に記述される。転記の必要がなければ、勘定科目は必要ではない。総勘定元帳に転記するにはほとんどの場合必要。

label: Main Account Description
description: Description of accountMainID - the human readable describer that accompanies the code used in accountMainID
description-ja: 主勘定科目コードの説明。主勘定科目コードとして使用されるコードについての、人が読める記述。

label: Account Classification
description: Account type - FASB Concepts 6 and similar international designs. When xbrlInfo is used to associate other XBRL reporting items, this field is more suited to representing existing systems (audit) than data interchange.
description-ja: 主勘定科目の種別。FASB Concepts 6および、同様の国際的な様式。xbrlInfoが他のXBRL項目と関係付けられる場合、データ交換より現存システム(audit)を示すべき。\n[設定値のリスト]\n(asset：資産)、(liability：負債)、(equity：資本)、(income：収益)、(gain：利得)、(expense：費用)、(loss：損失)、(contr-to-equity：資本増加)、(distr-from-equity：資本減少)、(comprehensive-income：包括利益)、(other：その他)

label: Account Classification Description
description: Free format description of the account classification
description-ja: 主勘定科目の区分の説明。

label: Parent Account Number
description: Roll up item from child natural account to parent natural account.
description-ja: 子勘定科目から親勘定科目に包み込む科目。

label: Purpose of Account
description: Code related to usage for account aggregate - Consolidating, European, IFRS, Offsetting, Primary, Tax, USGAAP, Japanese, Other. Japanese companies will use this for the tax required offsetting entry. If left blank, assumes default accounting method for company.
description-ja: 勘定科目群の使用法を示すコード。連結、European, IFRS, 見返、プライマリ, 税, USGAAP, Japanese,その他。日本企業では、見返仕訳で要求される税務処理に利用するかもしれない。空白の場合、企業の既定の勘定方法とみなす。\n[設定値のリスト]\n(consolidating：連結)、(european：ヨーロッパ)、(ifrs：IFRS)、(offsetting：見返)、(primary：プライマリ)、(tax：税)、(usgaap：US GAAP)、(japanese：日本)、(other：その他)

label: Description of Purpose of Account
description: Description of usage for aggregate account
description-ja: 勘定科目群の使用法の説明。

label: Account Type
description: Type of account
description-ja: 科目の種別。\n[設定値のリスト]\n(account：勘定科目)、(bank：銀行)、(employee：従業員)、(customer：顧客)、(job：ジョブ)、(vendor：仕入先)、(measurable：計測可能物)、(statistical：統計)、(other：その他)

label: Account Type Description
description: Free format description of the account type
description-ja: 科目の種別の説明。

label: Entry Accounting Method
description: For this entry, the method of accounting represented - from: accrual, cash, modified cash, modified accrual, encumbrance, special methods, hybrid methods, other
description-ja:
この仕訳の会計処理方法を表す。発生基準、現金基準、修正現金基準、修正発生基準、債務基準、特別な方法、混合方法、その他
[設定値のリスト]
(accrual：発生基準)、(cash：現金基準)、(modified cash：修正現金基準)、(modified accrual：修正発生基準)、(encumbrance：債務基準)、(special methods：特別な方法)、(hybrid methods：混合方法)、(other：その他)

label: Entry Accounting Method Description
description: Free format description of the entry accounting method
label-ja: 仕訳会計処理方法説明
description-ja: 仕訳の会計処理方法の説明。

label: Entry Accounting Method Purpose
description: For this entry, the reporting purpose represented - from book, tax, management, statutory, other
label-ja: 仕訳会計処理方法目的
description-ja:
仕訳の報告の目的を表す。帳簿、税、管理、スタチュトリ、その他
[設定値のリスト]
(book：帳簿)、(tax：税)、(management：管理)、(statutory：スタチュトリ)、(other：その他)

label: Entry Accounting Method Purpose Description
description: Free format description of the entry accounting method purpose
label-ja: 仕訳会計処理方法目的説明
description-ja: 仕訳の会計処理方法の目的の説明。

label: Subaccount Information
description: Tuple to hold multiple accountSubIDs and Descriptions
description-ja: 複数のaccountSubIDと説明文を含むタプル。

label: Subaccount Description
description: The description that accompanies accountSubID belongs here.
description-ja: accountSubIDに関する説明。

label: Subaccount
description: Where the primary account was placed in accountMainID, the code used for each profit center, division, business unit, fund, program, branch, project, class, su-class or other modifier is placed here.
description-ja: 主勘定科目をaccountMainIDに指定したときに、各プロフィットセンタ、事業部、事業体、基金、プログラム、支店、プロジェクト、クラス、su-クラス又は他の修飾子に使用されるコードはここに指定する。

label: Type of Subaccount
description: Type of sub-account - profit center, division, business unit, fund, program, branch, project, class, su-class or other modifier is placed here. For example:: Accountability center: Business unit: Class:Department: Project: Fund: Program:Job: Profit center: Branch: Setup class: Division: Unit
description-ja: 小勘定科目の種別。プロフィットセンタ、事業部、事業体、基金、プログラム、支店、プロジェクト、クラス、su-クラス又は他の修飾子がここに配置される。 例えば、責任単位、事業単位、クラス、部、プロジェクト、基金、プログラム、ジョブ、プロフィットセンター、支店、セットアップクラス、部門、ユニット\n

label: Segment Parent Information
description: Tuple for showing the detail necessary to roll up from one segment (type of subaccount) to another.)
description-ja: セグメント（小勘定科目の種別）間のロールアップ時に必要な詳細情報を示すタプル。

label: Parent Subaccount Code
description: Subaccount NUMBER this subaccount rolls up to - see also subaccount type it rolls up to.
description-ja: この小勘定科目のロールアップ先の小勘定科目の番号-ロールアップ先の小勘定科目の種別も参照。

label: Parent Subaccount Type
description: The describer of the segment this subaccount rolls up to.
description-ja: この小勘定科目のロールアップ先のセグメントの説明。

label: Reporting Tree Identifier
description: Used for representing descriptions of reporting trees.
description-ja: 報告系統の説明に使用される。

label: Parent Subaccount Percentage
description: For partial allocations of amounts to different parents, the percentage of a child that will be allocated to a parent.
label-ja: 親サブ科目配分パーセンテージ
description-ja: 異なる親科目に配分する場合に、親科目に割り当てるパーセンテージ。

label: Account Active
description: Boolean to indicate whether the account is active (="true") or inactive (="false")
description-ja: 科目が有効か無効かを示すブール値。

label: Monetary Amount
description: This field (amount) represents the primary monetary amount related to the  subject of the entryDetail line. There is one primary monetary amount per entryDetail structure. It may, for example, represent the amount of one line of a journal entry, the balance on a document, or the extended amount of a line item on an invoice. Amount is not required if detailed entry is used for non-financial work and other elements are populated, in particular measurableQuantity. The amount field is a signed number (either positive or negative itself) and used in conjunction with a separate signOfAmount and a separate debitCreditCode, which together are considered for understanding the monetary amount. The unit of measure is determined by amountCurrency if present, and by the default or home currency if amountCurrency is not present.
description-ja: entryDetailの代表的な金額を示す。entryDetailごとにひとつの値を持つ。たとえば、仕訳帳の行、残高、請求書の行の金額。明細が会計業務用でなく、measurableQuantityなどの他の要素が設定されている場合は不要。符号付数値であり、金額を解釈するために用意されたsignOfAmountおよびdebitCreditCodeとあわせて使用される。通貨単位はamountCurrencyで決定される。amountCurrencyが指定されない場合は、既定または自国の通貨単位となる。

label: Currency
description: The currency related to the amount can be entered here instead of the XBRL instance specified way, especially important in multi-currency situations. Recommend ISO 4217 coding.
description-ja: XBRLインスタンス内に指定する方法のかわりに、金額の通貨を指定可能。多通貨環境で特に重要。ISO4217コード体系を推奨。

label: Original Exchange Rate Date
description: Date of exchange rate used to record the original transaction.
label-ja: 原取引通貨換算レート日付
description-ja: 原取引の記録に使われた通貨換算レートの日付。

label: Amount in Original Currency
description: Amount in original (as opposed to home) currency, for multi-currency tracking.
description-ja: 多通貨取引のための、(自国通貨に対する)原取引通貨での金額。

label: Original Currency
description: The currency used to track original, as opposed to home, amounts. Recommended ISO 4217 coding.
description-ja: 自国通貨に対する、原取引通貨。ISO4217コードを推奨。

label: Original Exchange Rate
description: Exchange rate at time of original transaction (expressed as national currency divided by original currency)
label-ja: 原取引通貨換算レート
description-ja: 原取引時の通貨換算レート。（自国通貨を原取引通貨で割った値）

label: Original Exchange Rate Source
description: Source of Exchange Rate - for example, Reuters, Bloomberg
label-ja: 原取引通貨換算レート情報源
description-ja: 通貨換算レートの情報源。たとえば、Reuters, Bloomberg。

label: Original Exchange Rate Comment
description: Comment about exchange rate used for recording original transaction.
label-ja: 原取引通貨換算レートコメント
description-ja: 原取引の記録に使用された通貨換算レートに関するコメント。

label: Original Amount in Triangulation Currency
description: If triangulation is used, amount in triangulation currency, for multi-currency tracking. Debit is entered as positive, credit as negative.
label-ja: 原取引トライアンギュレーション通貨換算額
description-ja: トライアンギュレーション取引の場合に、トライアンギュレーション通貨での金額を指定する。借方は正、貸方は負の値を指定。

label: Original Triangulation Currency
description: The currency used for triangulation, if used. May often be EUR or USD. Recommended ISO 4217 coding.
label-ja: 原取引トライアンギュレーション通貨
description-ja: トライアンギュレーション取引時の通貨。EUR、USDなど。ISO4217コードを推奨。

label: National to Triangulation Currency Exchange Rate
description: Exchange rate between national currency and triangulation currency at time of original transaction (expressed as national currency divided by triangulation currency)
label-ja: 自国通貨トライアンギュレーション通貨換算レート
description-ja: 原取引時の、自国通貨とトライアンギュレーション通貨との換算レート。（自国通貨をトライアンギュレーション通貨で割った値）

label: National to Triangulation Currency Exchange Rate Source
description: Source of Exchange Rate for triangulation amount at time of original transaction - for example, Reuters, Bloomberg
label-ja: 自国通貨トライアンギュレーション通貨換算レート情報源
description-ja: 原取引時の、トライアンギュレーション取引金額の換算レートの情報源。たとえば、Reuters, Bloomberg。

label: National to Triangulation Currency Exchange Rate Type
description: Type of Exchange Rate for triangulation amount at time of original transaction - for example, spot rate, forward contract etc.
label-ja: 自国通貨トライアンギュレーション通貨換算レート種別
description-ja: 原取引時の、トライアンギュレーション取引金額の換算レートの種別。たとえば、スポット・レート、先物など。

label: Original to Triangulation Currency Exchange Rate
description: Exchange rate between original currency and triangulation currency at time of original transaction (expressed as original currency divided by triangulation currency)
label-ja: 原取引通貨トライアンギュレーション通貨換算レート
description-ja: 原取引時の、原取引通貨とトライアンギュレーション通貨との換算レート。（原取引通貨をトライアンギュレーション通貨で割った値）

label: Original to Triangulation Currency Exchange Rate Source
description: Source of Exchange Rate for triangulation from original currency to triangulation currency at time of original transaction - for example, Reuters, Bloomberg
label-ja: 原取引通貨トライアンギュレーション通貨換算レート情報源
description-ja: 原取引時の、原取引通貨からトライアンギュレーション通貨への換算レートの情報源。たとえば、Reuters, Bloomberg。

label: Original to Triangulation Currency Exchange Rate Type
description: Type of Exchange Rate for triangulation from original currency to triangulation currency at time of original transaction - for example, spot rate, forward contract etc.
label-ja: 原取引通貨トライアンギュレーション通貨換算レート種別
description-ja: 原取引時の、原取引通貨からトライアンギュレーション通貨への換算レートの種別。たとえば、スポット・レート、先物など。

label: Sign Indication for Amount
description: Sign of amount; provides 4 possible fields only when used in conjunction with debitCreditCode; primarily used for correcting entries so total debits and credits after an entry error are not inflated. D + increase DebitsD - decrease debitsC + decreases creditC - increases credit
description-ja: 金額の符号。貸借識別子と関連して使用される場合にだけ、4つの可能なフィールドを提供する。記入エラー後の総貸借が膨張しないように、おもに仕訳の訂正に使用される。 D+は借方を増加させる。D-は借方を減少させる。C+は貸方を減少させる。C-は貸方を増加させる。\n[設定値のリスト]\n(+)、(-)、(plus：プラス)、(minus：マイナス)

label: Debit/Credit Identifier
description: Optional identifier of whether the amount is a (D)ebit, a (C)redit or Undefined
description-ja: 金額が借方か貸方か不定かを示す識別子。\n[設定値のリスト]\n(D)、(C)、(debit：借方)、(credit：貸方)、(undefined：不定)

label: Posting Date
description: At the detail level, this represents the accounting significance date. No matter what date the document is received, entered, or posted, this signifies the accounting date of the entry. If you want to see the financial results for March 5, 2002 and this entry is given that date, the entry will be part of the results for March 5, 2002. This is different from the postedDate found at the entryHeader level. If you want the accounting significance to be a particular date, it goes here. A single entry could represent multiple dates, but would only be posted on one date.
description-ja: 明細レベルで、会計上意義のある日付を示す。ドキュメントの受領、入力、転記の日付に関わらず、仕訳が会計処理された日付を示す。2002.03.05の財務結果を見たいときに、ここにその日付がある場合は、この明細は2002.03.05の結果の一部である。これは、entryHeaderにあるpostedDateとは異なる。特定の日付を会計上意義のある日付にしたいなら、ここに記述する。ひとつの仕訳が複数の日付をあらわせるが、ひとつの日でのみ転記される。

label: Memo Line
description: A boolean like entry that indicates whether an entryDetail line has been provided solely to provide additional details and that tools should not consider the amount in postings.
description-ja: 明細行が単に追加の詳細を与えるものであり、転記金額に含めるべきでないことを示すブール値。

label: INVOICE LINE ALLOWANCES
description: A group of business terms providing information about allowances applicable to the individual Invoice line.

label: Invoice line allowance amount
description: The amount of an allowance, without VAT.

label: Invoice line allowance base amount
description: The base amount that may be used, in conjunction with the Invoice line allowance percentage, to calculate the Invoice line allowance amount.

label: Invoice line allowance percentage
description: The percentage that may be used, in conjunction with the Invoice line allowance base amount, to calculate the Invoice line allowance amount

label: Invoice line allowance reason
description: The reason for the Invoice line allowance, expressed as text.

label: Invoice line allowance reason code
description: The reason for the Invoice line allowance, expressed as a code.

label: INVOICE LINE CHARGES
description: A group of business terms providing information about charges and taxes other than VAT applicable to the individual Invoice line.

label: Invoice line charge amount
description: The amount of a charge, without VAT.

label: Invoice line charge base amount
description: The base amount that may be used, in conjunction with the Invoice line charge percentage, to calculate the Invoice line charge amount.

label: Invoice line charge percentage
description: The percentage that may be used, in conjunction with the Invoice line charge base amount, to calculate the Invoice line charge amount.

label: Invoice line charge reason
description: The reason for the Invoice line charge, expressed as text.

label: Invoice line charge reason code
description: The reason for the Invoice line charge, expressed as a code.

label: Item description
description: A description for an item.

label: Allocation Code
description: Code associated with the calculation formula: e.g. (D)ivide by number of periods, (T)otal for period given
description-ja: 計算方式に関するコード。例えば、(D)期間数で分割、(T)与えられた期間の合計。

label: Multicurrency Detail
description: Section to provide additional information related to home currencies that differ from original currencies and related exchange rates - typically this will be used to record exchange rates and amounts in currencies and/or on dates other than those of the original transaction. This structure allows recording of exchange rates using a third currency as a triangulation currency. This is often EUR but is not restricted to being so. This structure may be repeated as many times as necessary to record amounts in foreign currencies on the same or different dates.
description-ja: 原取引時の通貨と異なる、自国通貨と換算レートに関する追加情報のセクション。－現在および原取引時の、換算レートおよび金額の記録に使用される。\nトライアンギュレーション通貨としての第三通貨の換算レートを記録できる。EURの場合が多いがそれに限らない。この構造は、同日または異なる日の外貨での金額を記録する必要がある限り、繰り返し指定可能。

label: Date of Exchange Rate
description: Date of exchange rate (other than original transaction date) on which amount is expressed as amountRestatedAmount or amountTriangulationAmount
description-ja: （原取引の日付ではなく）、amountRestatedAmountまたはamountTriangulationAmountが示された換算レートの日付。

label: Restated Amount
description: The amount in the foreign currency identified by amountRestatedCurrency as of multicurrencyDetailExchangeRateDate.
description-ja: amountRestatedCurrencyで指定された外貨での、multicurrencyDetailExchangeRateDate時点の、換算額。

label: Currency of Restated Amount
description: The currency in which amountRestatedAmount is expressed. Recommended ISO 4217 coding.
description-ja: amountRestatedAmountで使用される通貨。ISO4217コードを推奨。

label: Restated Amount Exchange Rate
description: Exchange rate used to convert amountRestatedAmount as of multicurrencyDetailExchangeRateDate (expressed as national currency divided by foreign currency)
description-ja: amountRestatedAmountの算出に用いられた、multicurrencyDetailExchangeRateDate時点の換算レート。（自国通貨を外貨通貨で割った値）\n

label: Restated Amount Exchange Rate Source
description: Source of Exchange Rate for restated amount - for example, Reuters, Bloomberg
description-ja: 外貨換算額の換算レートの情報源。たとえば、Reuters, Bloomberg。

label: Restated Amount Exchange Rate Type
description: Type of Exchange Rate for restated amount - for example, spot rate, forward contract etc.
description-ja: 外貨換算額の換算レートの種別。たとえば、スポット・レート、先物など。

label: Amount in Triangulation Currency
description: The amount in the triangulation currency identified by amountTriangulationCurrency as of multicurrencyDetailExchangeRateDate.
label-ja: トライアンギュレーション通貨換算額
description-ja: amountTriangulationCurrencyで指定されたトライアンギュレーション通貨での、multicurrencyDetailExchangeRateDate時点の換算額。

label: Triangulation Currency
description: The currency used for tringulation between amountRestatedCurrency and the home currency. Recommended ISO 4217 coding.
label-ja: トライアンギュレーション通貨
description-ja: amountRestatedCurrencyと自国通貨間のトライアンギュレーション取引で使用される通貨。ISO4217コードを推奨。

label: Triangulation Exchange Rate
description: Exchange rate used to convert amountTriangulationAmount as of multicurrencyDetailExchangeRateDate (expressed as national currency divided by triangulation currency)
label-ja: トライアンギュレーション通貨換算レート
description-ja: amountTriangulationAmountの算出に用いられた、multicurrencyDetailExchangeRateDate時点の換算レート。（自国通貨をトライアンギュレーション通貨で割った値）

label: Triangulation Exchange Rate Source
description: Source of Exchange Rate for triangulation amount - for example, Reuters, Bloomberg
label-ja: トライアンギュレーション通貨換算レート情報源
description-ja: トライアンギュレーション通貨換算額の換算レートの情報源。たとえば、Reuters, Bloomberg。

label: Triangulation Exchange Rate Type
description: Type of Exchange Rate for triangulation amount - for example, spot rate, forward contract etc.
label-ja: トライアンギュレーション通貨換算レート種別
description-ja: トライアンギュレーション通貨換算額の換算レートの種別。たとえば、スポット・レート、先物など。

label: Restated Triangulation Exchange Rate
description: Exchange rate used to convert from amountRestatedAmount to amountTriangulationAmount as of multicurrencyDetailExchangeRateDate (expressed as foreign currency divided by triangulation currency)
label-ja: 換算通貨トライアンギュレーション通貨換算レート
description-ja: amountRestatedAmountからamountTriangulationAmountへの、multicurrencyDetailExchangeRateDate時点の換算レート。（外貨通貨をトライアンギュレーション通貨で割った値）

label: Restated Triangulation Exchange Rate Source
description: Source of Exchange Rate for converting between foreign currency and triangulation currency - for example, Reuters, Bloomberg
label-ja: 換算通貨トライアンギュレーション通貨換算レート情報源
description-ja: 外貨通貨とトライアンギュレーション通貨の間の換算レートの情報源。たとえば、Reuters, Bloomberg。

label: Restated Triangulation Exchange Rate Type
description: Type of Exchange Rate for converting between foreign currency and triangulation currency - for example, spot rate, forward contract etc.
label-ja: 換算通貨トライアンギュレーション通貨換算レート種別

description-ja: CVE識別子が有効か無効かを示すブール値。

description-ja: 顧客への請求書、ベンダからの請求書、小切手、その他の列挙値による、元文書の説明。\n[設定値のリスト]\n(check：小切手)、(debit-memo：借方メモ)、(credit-memo：貸方メモ)、(finance-charge：財務費用)、(invoice：顧客への請求書)、(order-customer：顧客オーダ)、(order-vendor：仕入先オーダ)、(payment-other：その他支払い)、(reminder：督促状)、(tegata：手形)、(voucher：ベンダからの請求書)、(shipment：出荷票)、(receipt：受領票)、(manual-adjustment：手修正)、(other：その他)

description: Free format description of the document type

label: Document Number
description: Invoice, check, voucher, or other source document identifier
description-ja: 請求書、小切手、証憑、その他の元文書の識別子。

label: Apply To Number
description: Document number of primary invoice number, used to offset payments, debits and credits; for an invoice, usually the same as the documentNumber. When calculating open balance on an invoice, or open amount on payments in advance or not fully applied, this permits calculation of the open item.
description-ja: 支払、借方、貸方の相殺に使用される、一次請求書の文書番号。請求書では通常documentNumberと等しい。未決済の請求書残高や、未決済の支払金額の計算時に、利用できる。

label: Document Reference
description: Internal reference for the document above; number assigned internally to track the document
description-ja: 上の文書のための内部参照情報。文書を追跡するために内部的に割り当てた番号。

label: Document Date
description: Date (and less likely in the paper world but possible in the e-world, time) on actual document (invoice, voucher, check date). Other dates control posting information.
description-ja: 実際の文書（請求書、証憑、小切手）の日付（および、紙の世界ではありそうにないが、電子的には時刻）。 転記の情報は別の日付で管理する。

label: Received Date
description: Date/time document was noted as received (if necessary). Represents actual date received. Posting dates are maintained separately.
description-ja: （必要であれば）文書の受領が記録された日付/時刻。実際に受領された日付をあらわす。転記日付は別に管理される。

label: Chargeable or Reimbursable
description: Is this entry chargeable to client, reimbursable? Used by some systems to indicate that account on posting/validation should be posted to a customer or vendor's account.
description-ja: この仕訳は顧客に請求、支払可能か。いくつかのシステムでは転記/検証対象の科目が顧客や仕入先の科目に転記されるべきかどうかを示すために使用される。

label: Document Location
description: Document location as URI, file name or other reference. Alternatively, text of document can be placed here.
description-ja: 文書の格納場所である、URI、ファイル名またはその他の参照情報。代わりに、文書のテキストも記述可能。

label: Payment Method
description: Method used or to be used to make the payment
description-ja: 支払いのために使用された、または使用される方法。

label: Posting Status
description:
deferred: although entered, it cannot be posted until a later time
posted: already posted
proposed: a proposed item that must be approved
simulated: a simulated item, for what-if
tax: a tax-specific entry
unposted:entered but not yet posted or validated
cancelled:entered and later cancelled
other:other status - should be described in postingStatusDescription
description-ja:
・据置：入力されたが、まだ転記できない。
・転記済：転記済み。
・提案済：検証が必要な項目。
・シミュレーション：仮定のためにシミュレートされた項目。
・税：税項目。
・未転記：入力されたが、まだ検証も転記もされていない。
・取消済：入力されたが、取り消された。
・その他：その他の状態。postingStatusDescriptionで説明されるべき。
[設定値のリスト]
(deferred：据置)、(posted：転記済)、(proposed：提案済)、(simulated：シミュレーション)、(tax：税)、(unposted：未転記)、(cancelled：取消済)、(other：その他)

label: Posting Status Description
description: Free format description of the posting status
description-ja: 転記状態の説明。

label: XBRL Information
description: This will roll up to XBRL reporting information - this is a parent - repeatable so that the same item can be reported through many taxonomies. Care should be taken to consider what happens if people post to the same account but different XBRL elements.
description-ja: XBRLレポート情報へのロールアップ情報。親タグであり、同じ項目が複数のタクソノミを通じて報告されうるように繰り返し可能。同一の勘定科目を異なるXBRL要素に転記した場合にどうなるか、注意深く考慮すべきである。

label: XBRL Allocation
description: Indicates that the information being given is beginning_balance, ending_balance, period_change.
description-ja: 与えられた情報が、期首残高、期末残高、期中増減のいずれであるかを示す。\n[設定値のリスト]\n(beginning_balance：期首残高)、(ending_balance：期末残高)、(period_change：期中増減)

label: Summary Reporting Element
description: Associated XBRL element or XML element within an XML taxonomy - mapping to an XBRL concept.
description-ja: 関係付けられた、XMLタクソノミ中のXBRL要素または、XML要素。XBRLコンセプトへのマッピング。

label: Detail Matching Element
description: Associated XBRL element in XBRL-GL instance.
description-ja: 関係付けられた、XBRL-GLインスタンス中のXBRL要素。

label: Summary Tuple Path
description: Specific filter for parent tuple structure. This value must be valid XPath. And the result of the XPath must be resolved to a node.
description-ja: 親タグ構造を特定するフィルタ。妥当なXPath記述でなければならない。XPathの結果はノードでなければならない。

label: Detailed Content Filter
description: Filtering mechanism. This value must be valid XPath. And the result of the XPath must be resolved to boolean. If the resulting value is false, the entry  must not mapped into specified facts in F/S.
label-ja: 明細コンテントフィルタ
description-ja: フィルタリング手段。妥当なXPath記述でなければならない。XPathの結果はブール値でなければならない。結果がfalseの場合は、仕訳はF/S内の特定のfactsにマッピングされてはならない。

label: Reporting Date Selector

description-ja: F/Sのコンテキストを生成するためのGLデータの概念を示す。QNameのリストでなければならない。個々のQNameはGL項目を示さなければならない。項目の並びはアクセスの優先度を示す。

description-ja: 集約の有効桁数と小数部有効桁数の記述の指定場所。

label: Summary Precision
description: This item indicates that the fact in the FR instance has a precision attribute with the value specified in this item value.
description-ja: 集約の有効桁数の記述の指定場所。

label: Summary Precision INF
description: This item, when used, has no value. Its only presence indicates that the fact in the FR instance  has a precision attribute  and its value is INF.
description-ja: F/Sが、有効桁数属性を持っており、その値がINF(無限大)であること示す。

label: Summary Decimals
description: This item indicates that the fact in the FR instance has a decimals attribute with the value specified in this item value.
description-ja: F/Sが、ここで指定する値の小数部有効桁数属性を持っていることを示す。

label: Summary Decimals INF
description: This item, when used, has no value. Its only presence indicates that the fact in the FR instance  has a decimals attribute  and its value is INF.
label-ja: 集約小数部有効桁数無限
description-ja: F/Sが、小数部有効桁数属性を持っており、その値がINF(無限大)であることを示す。

label: Senario Typed Dimension
description: The QName value must be resolved to a valid dimension item.
description-ja: QNameの値は妥当なディメンション項目を示さなければならない。

label: Senario Typed Dimension Value
description: The value must be CDATA and a valid XML fragment and also schema valid against an appropriate typed dimension schema.
label-ja: 集約タイプトディメンション値
description-ja: CDATAであり、妥当なXML記述でなければならない。スキーマは、入力されたディメンションスキーマに対して妥当でなければならない。

label: Senario Simple Element
description: This structure allows to explicitly indicate the information related to a simple elemtn in the context for a fact in the FR instance.
label-ja: 【集約シンプルエレメントコンテント】
description-ja: セグメントまたはシナリオの、空要素を表現するためのタプル。

label: Senario Simple Element Content
description: QName for the simple element, if appropriate.
label-ja: 集約シンプルエレメント名
description-ja: 集約シンプルエレメントの記述のQName

label: Senario Simple Element Value
description: The value of the simple element.
label-ja: 集約シンプルエレメント値
description-ja: シンプルエレメントの値。

label: Senario Non Dimensional Contents
description: The value must be CDATA and a valid XML fragment.
label-ja: 集約非ディメンションコンテント
description-ja: CDATAであり、妥当なXML記述でなければならない。

label: Summary Unit
description: This structure allows to explicitly indicate the information related to the unit for a fact in the FR instance..
description-ja: 集約のユニットの記述の指定場所。

label: Summary Unit Numerator
description: This holds the list of measure information for unit numerator. The value must be a list of QName. Each QName must be resolved to be measure information such as iso4217:usd.
description-ja: 集約のユニットの分子の測定情報のリスト。QNameのリストでなければならない。QNameはiso4217:usdのような、解決される測定情報でなければならない。

label: Summary Unit Denominator
description: This holds the list of measure information for unit denominator. The value must be a list of QName. Each QName must be resolved to be measure information such as iso4217:usd.
description-ja: 集約のユニットの分母の測定情報のリスト。QNameのリストでなければならない。QNameはiso4217:usdのような、解決される測定情報でなければならない。

label: Summary Reporting Taxonomy ID Reference
description: Reference to the ID of the relevant target reporting taxonomy, defined in the [summaryReportingTaxonomies] structure at [documentInfo] level. Allows consuming applications to identify sets of [xbrlInfo] structures that point to a specific taxonomy.
label-ja: 集約報告タクソノミ識別子参照情報
description-ja: 関連する報告タクソノミの識別子への参照情報。documentInfo内のsummaryReportingTaxonomies構造体で定義される。特定のタクソノミを示すxbrlInfo構造体の集合を、アプリケーションが識別できるようにする。

label: Description
description: Description of this line of detail only
description-ja: この明細行のみに対する説明。

label: Acknowledgement Date
description: Date of acknowledgement of goods/services shipped/received.
description-ja: 出荷/受領済みの物品/サービスを承認した日付。

label: Confirmation Date
description: Date of confirmation of shipment/receipt.
description-ja: 出荷/受領を確認した日付。

label: Ship From
description: References organizationAddressLocationIdentifier where used. Otherwise freeform.
description-ja: organizationAddressLocationIdentifierの参照情報。または自由記述。

label: Date Shipped/Received
description: Date goods/services are shipped/received.
description-ja: 物品/サービスを出荷/受領した日付。

label: Maturity Date or Date Due
description: Due date or other maturity date.
description-ja: 支払期日やその他の期日。

label: Payment Terms
description: Discount/payment terms.
description-ja: 割引/支払い条件。

label: Measurable
description: Parent for information regarding measurable items associated with the enclosing entryDetail line. Primary area used for holding performance measures. Based on needs for tracking inventory transactional detail, but suitable for anything assigned to an "account", "reporting bucket" or "code". Can be used to track any movements.
description-ja: 明細行に関係付けられた、計測可能物の情報の親タグ。おもにパフォーマンス測定のために使用される。在庫移動の詳細の追跡の必要性に基づき、「科目」、「報告バケット」、「コード」に関係付けられるあらゆるものに適する。あらゆる活動を追跡するために使用可能。

label: Measurable Code
description: Code for measurable item including BP - Business process, FA - Fixed asset/Capitalized item, IN - Inventory, KPI - Metric, NT - Intangible, SP - Supplies, SV-P - Service by employee, vendor or contractor, SV-M - Service by equipment/machinery, OT - Other
description-ja: 計測可能物のコード。ビジネスプロセス、固定資産/資産化項目、在庫、測定基準、無形資産、貯蔵品、従業員/提供元/請負者によるサービス、装置/機械によるサービス、その他\n[設定値のリスト]\n(BP：ビジネスプロセス)、(FA：固定資産/資産化項目)、(IN：在庫)、(KPI：測定基準)、(NT：無形資産)、(SP：貯蔵品)、(SV-P：従業員/提供元/請負者によるサービス)、(SV-M：装置/機械によるサービス)、(OT：その他)

label: Measurable Code Description
description: Free format description of the measurable code
label-ja: 計測可能物コード説明
description-ja: 計測可能物のコードの説明。

label: Measurable Category
description: Category of the measurable
description-ja: 計測可能物のカテゴリ。

label: Measurable Identification
description: Internal inventory part or SKU number or other code identifier for the measurable.
description-ja: 計測可能物の社内在庫部分またはSKU番号またはその他のコード識別子。

label: Schema for Measurable Identification
description: URI or other identifier for schema with which measurable ID can be validated
label-ja: 計測可能物識別子スキーマ
description-ja: 計測可能物のIDを検証するスキーマの、URIまたはその他の識別子。

label: Secondary Measurable Identifier
description: Second identifier (such as vendor's item number)
label-ja: 計測可能物第二識別子
description-ja: 第二識別子。（例えば、ベンダーでの品目番号）。

label: Schema for Secondary Measurable Identification
description: URI or other identifier for schema with which measurable ID Other can be validated
label-ja: 計測可能物第二識別子スキーマ
description-ja: 計測可能物の第二IDを検証するスキーマの、URIまたはその他の識別子。

label: Measurable Description
description: Text description of measurable (e.g. inventory item or other identifier)
description-ja: 計測可能物の説明。（たとえば、在庫やその他の識別子）\n

label: Quantity
description: Number of units in this transaction; for non-monetary calculations; can be square footage, number of people, etc.
description-ja: この取引における、単位数量。金額計算用ではない。平方フィート、人数など。

label: Qualifier
description: Field that can represent grading, inspection codes, ratings and other qualifiers to properly capture PKI/Balanced Scorecard information
description-ja: PKI又はバランススコアカード情報を適正に把握するための、等級付け、検査コード、格付けその他の修飾子を示す。

label: Item Seller's identifier
description: An identifier, assigned by the Seller, for the item.

label: Item Buyer's identifier
description: An identifier, assigned by the Buyer, for the item.

label: Item Country of Origin
description: The code identifying the country from which the item originates.

label: Unit of Measure
description: Description of unit: e.g. each, case, dozen, etc. ISO standard coding recommended.
description-ja: 単位の説明。たとえば、個、箱、ダースなど。ISO標準のコードを推奨。

label: Per Unit Cost/Price
description: Per unit price of the measurable. Although one might expect that measurableQuantity * measurableCostPerUnit = amount, this is not mandated except by external rules sets.
description-ja: 計測可能物の単価。measurableQuantity * measurableCostPerUnit = amountであることを期待するかもしれないが、外部規則がなければ必須ではない。

label: Start Time
description: Start time of the duration being measured
description-ja: 計量期間の開始時刻。

label: End Time
description: End time of the duration being measured
description-ja: 計量期間の終了時刻。

label: Measurable Active
description: Boolean to indicate whether the measurable is active (="true") or inactive (="false")
description-ja: 計測可能物が有効か無効かを示すブール値。

label: Measurable Class ID
description: An enumerated code to identify the inventory, fixed asset or other measurable class. Enumerated as: raw material, work-in-process, finished goods, assemblies, supplies, land, building, machinery, furniture, vehicles, other.

label: Measurable Class Description
description: Free format description associated with gl-ehm:measurableClassID to provide specialization or clarification for the enumerated value of other.

label: Costing Method Code
description: An enumerated code for the inventory (or other measurable) costing method. Enumerated as: LIFO, FIFO, average, weighted-average, standard-cost, tax-basis, book-basis, other.

label: Costing Method Description
description: Free format description associated with gl-ehm:costingMethodCode to provide specialization of clarification for the enumerated value of other.

label: Geospatial Coordinate
description:
Enter a relevant location for this item. Format can be either:
- Degrees, minutes, and seconds (DMS): 41°24'12.2"N 2°10'26.5"E
- Degrees and decimal minutes (DMM): 41 24.2028, 2 10.4418
- Decimal degrees (DD): 41.40338, 2.17403

label: Serial Lot
description: Tuple for holding information about serial numbers or lots (batches). As a tuple, this permits multiple serial numbers or multiple lot number batches within a single gl-cor:measurable structure.

label: Serial Lot Code
description: Is this item tracked by serial numbers or lot numbers? A serial number is usually a unique number assigned to a single; a lot or batch number is provided when a batch of items is fungible but must be differentiated from similar items from other batches. Enumerated indicator for serial or lot items. Enumeration are: serial, lot, other, neither. If not included within the tuple, neither is assumed.

label: Serial Lot Description
description: Free format description associated with gl-ehm:serialLotCode to provide specialization and especially to provide clarification for the enumerated value of other in serialLotCode. Examples might be “batch” or “group”.

label: Serial Lot Number
description: The holder for that actual serial number or lot (batch) number/code assigned to an item or a batch of items.

label: Next Serial Lot Number
description: A field for holding the next expected serial or lot number to be given to future assignments, or for chaining between already assigned items.

label: Serial Lot Quantity
description: The quantity of units in this particular batch. Unit of measure is the gl-bus:measurableUnitofMeasure.

label: Serial Lot Original Quantity
description: The quantity of units in this batch on inception.

label: Serial Lot Remaining Quantity
description: The remaining quantity of units from the original batch; may be the same as the quantity in this batch or include other batches from the same original batch.

label: Serial Lot Origination
description: Date of manufacture or creation.

label: Serial Lot Expiration
description: Expiration date of the batch.

label: Serial Lot Manufacturer
description: Manufacturer of the item (serial) or items (lot/batch).

label: Serial Lot Batch Description
description: A name or description of the items in the lot or batch.

label: Serial Lot Warranty Start Date
description: If the items are covered by warranty, when that warranty covered will begin or has begun.

label: Serial Lot Warranty End Date
description: If the items are covered by warranty, when that warranty covered will end or ended.

label: Serial Lot Warranty Period
description: Warranty period – numeric portion; for a 30 day warranty period, the 30 would go here, and the day would go in gl-ehm:serialLotWarrantyPeriodUnit.

label: Serial Lot Warranty Period Unit
description: Warrant period – time or cycle unit portion. Values from the XBRL Unit Registry (www.xbrl.org/utr/utr.xml) are suggested where possible. Examples might include: H (hours), D (days), M (months), Y (years), machine cycles, km (kilometers).

label: Serial Lot Warranty Vendor
description: The vendor providing warranty; this may differ from the manufacturer.

label: Serial Lot Warranty Contract
description: Contract or document information related to the warranty, such as a contract number and date or a URL with more information.

label: Serial Lot Comment
description: Free format text related to the serial number or lot.

label: ITEM ATTRIBUTES
description: A group of business terms providing information about properties of the goods and services invoiced.

label: Item attribute name
description: The name of the attribute or property of the item.

label: Item attribute value
description: The value of the attribute or property of the item.

label: Item net price
description: The price of an item, exclusive of VAT, after subtracting item price discount.

label: Item price discount
description: The total discount subtracted from the Item gross price to calculate the Item net price.

label: Item gross price
description: The unit price, exclusive of VAT, before subtracting Item price discount.

label: Job Information
description: Tuple for holding job related information, separate from jobs represented in account identifier. Would probably only have one jobinfo tuple for each entry line, but there may be a need to express more than one.
description-ja: 科目識別子で表現されるジョブとは別の、ジョブに関係する情報のタプル。個々の明細行に対してひとつだけ存在すると思われるが、複数必要かもしれない。

label: Job Identifier
description: Associated job number or code. This could be built into the account, but many systems maintain a separate job coding system. Use primarily if job identification is a separate system, and not considered part of the chart of accounts.
description-ja: 関連するジョブ番号かジョブコード。 科目に組み込めるかもしれないが、多くのシステムでは独立したジョブコードシステムを持っている。おもに、ジョブの識別が別システムであり、科目体系に含まれないときに使用される。

label: Job Description
description: Description of job
description-ja: ジョブの説明。

label: Job Phase
description: Job code, phase, activity. Allows greater granularity than a simple job number. Although the core only reaches down from job to phases, this can be customized to extend down to cost codes.
description-ja: ジョブコード、フェーズ、活動。 簡単なジョブ番号より詳細な定義が可能。基本的には、ジョブからフェーズを導くのみだが、コストコードにまでいたるように拡張可能。

label: Job Phase Description
description: Description of Job code, phase, activity
description-ja: ジョブコード、フェーズ、活動の説明。

label: Job Active
description: Boolean to indicate whether the job is active (="true") or inactive (="false")
description-ja: ジョブが有効か無効かを示すブール値。

label: Depreciation Mortgage
description: Parent for information related to depreciation, mortgages, etc.
description-ja: 減価償却、抵当債務等に関連する情報の親タグ。

label: Mortgage Jurisdiction
description: Jurisdiction (e.g. federal, state, local): e.g. US Federal, Province of Québec, other identifier
description-ja: 管轄地区。（連邦、州、ローカル、等）。たとえば、米国連邦政府、ケベック州、その他の識別子。[設定値のリスト]\n(F)、(federal：連邦)、(S)、(state：州)、(L)、(local：地域)、(other：その他)\n

label: Depreciation Method
description: Type of depreciation method: used for information about the loan percentage for loan or the depreciation method. This is used for informational purposes only. Examples of entries are "20%", "5 year DDB" (Double Declining Balance).
description-ja: 減価償却方法のタイプ。ローンのパーセンテージや減価償却方法に関する情報を含む。単なる情報提供を目的とする。たとえば、20%、5年、DDB(倍額定率)。

label: Mortgage Life
description: Length of life in number of periods.
description-ja: 存在する期間数。

label: Description
description: Description of each item related to depreciation, mortgage, loan, credit facility, etc.
description-ja: 減価償却や債権債務、ローン、信用供与等に関する項目の説明。

label: Start Date
description: Start of the applicable period of each item related to depreciation, mortgage, loan, credit facility, etc.
description-ja: 減価償却や債権債務、ローン、信用供与等に関する項目の、適用期間の開始日。

label: End Date
description: End of the applicable period of each item related to depreciation, mortgage, loan, credit facility, etc.
description-ja: 減価償却や債権債務、ローン、信用供与等に関する項目の、適用期間の終了日。

label: Amount
description: Amount of a cost or fee charged for a mortgage, loan, credit facility, etc.
description-ja: 減価償却や債権債務、ローン、信用供与等で請求されるコストや手数料。

label: Tax Information
description: Tuple for holding tax related information
description-ja: 税関連の情報のタプル。

label: Tax Authority
description: Name of the relevant tax authority
description-ja: 関係する課税庁の名前。

label: Tax Table Code
description: Tax table code used by the relevant tax authority
description-ja: 関係する課税庁で使用される税率表のコード。

label: Tax Description
description: Description of tax authority
description-ja: 課税庁の説明。

label: Amount of Taxes
description: Amount of taxes
description-ja: 税額。

label: Basis for Taxation
description: Basis for taxation
description-ja: 課税基準。

label: If the tax is in a foreign currency, the exchange rate used expressed as national currency divided by foreign currency
description: If the tax is in a foreign currency, the exchange rate used expressed as national currency divided by foreign currency
label-ja: [非推奨] 税額換算用レート
description-ja: 税が外貨建ての場合の、換算レート。自国通貨を外貨で割った値。

label: Tax Percentage Rate
description: Percent rate for VAT or other taxes normally a number between 0 and 1.0 - e.g. 50% is represented as 0.5
description-ja: VAT(物品税)またはその他の税のパーセント比率。0から1.0の間の値。たとえば50%は0.5とあらわす。

label: Tax Category
description: A class or category of taxes
description-ja: 税のクラス又はカテゴリ。

label: Tax Comment/Exemption Reason
description: Additional text/code for exemption reasons or other comments.
description-ja: 免税理由やその他のコメントのための、追加の文またはコード。

label: Tax Amount in Foreign Currency
description: If the tax is in a foreign currency, the amount of tax in that currency
description-ja: 税が外貨建ての場合の、税額。

label: Tax Foreign Currency
description: If the tax is in a foreign currency, that currency
description-ja: 税が外貨建ての場合の、通貨。

label: Tax Exchange Rate Date
description: If the tax is in a foreign currency, the date or date and time of the exchange rate used
description-ja: 税が外貨建ての場合の、換算レートの日付または日付/時刻。

label: exchangeRateItemType
description: If the tax is in a foreign currency, the exchange rate used expressed as national currency divided by foreign currency
description-ja: 税が外貨建ての場合の、換算レート。自国通貨を外貨で割った値。

label: Tax Exchange Rate Source
description: If the tax is in a foreign currency, source of exchange rate - for example, Reuters, Bloomberg
label-ja: 税額換算レート情報源
description-ja: 税が外貨建ての場合の、換算レートの情報源。たとえば、Reuters, Bloomberg

label: Tax Exchange Rate Type
description: If the tax is in a foreign currency, type of exchange rate - for example, spot rate, forward contract etc.
description-ja: 税が外貨建ての場合の、換算レートの種別。たとえば、スポット・レート、先物など。

label: Tax Exchange Rate Comment
description: If the tax is in a foreign currency, comment about exchange rate used
label-ja: 税額換算レートコメント
description-ja: 税が外貨建ての場合の、換算レートに関するコメント。

label: Tax Amount in Triangulation Currency
description: If the tax is in a foreign currency and triangulation is used, the amount of that tax in the triangulation currency
label-ja: 税額トライアンギュレーション通貨換算額
description-ja: 税が外貨建てで、トライアンギュレーション取引の場合の、トライアンギュレーション通貨での税額。

label: Tax Triangulation Currency
description: If the tax is in a foreign currency and triangulation is used, the triangulation currency
label-ja: 税額換算トライアンギュレーション通貨
description-ja: 税が外貨建てで、トライアンギュレーション取引の場合の、トライアンギュレーション通貨。

label: Tax Triangulation Currency Exchange Rate
description: If the tax is in a foreign currency and triangulation is used, the exchange rate used expressed as national currency divided by triangulation currency
label-ja: 税額トライアンギュレーション通貨換算レート
description-ja: 税が外貨建てで、トライアンギュレーション取引の場合の、換算レート。自国通貨をトライアンギュレーション通貨で割った値。

label: Tax Triangulation Currency Exchange Rate Source
description: If the tax is in a foreign currency and triangulation is used, source of exchange rate - for example, Reuters, Bloomberg
label-ja: 税額トライアンギュレーション通貨換算レート情報源
description-ja: 税が外貨建てで、トライアンギュレーション取引の場合の、換算レートの情報源。たとえば、Reuters, Bloomberg\n

label: Tax Triangulation Currency Exchange Rate Type
description: If the tax is in a foreign currency and triangulation is used, type of exchange rate - for example, spot rate, forward contract etc.
label-ja: 税額トライアンギュレーション通貨換算レート種別
description-ja: 税が外貨建てで、トライアンギュレーション取引の場合の、換算レートの種別。たとえば、スポット・レート、先物など\n

label: Tax Foreign to Triangulation Currency Exchange Rate
description: If the tax is in a foreign currency and triangulation is used,  the exchange rate used expressed as foreign currency divided by triangulation currency
label-ja: 税額外貨トライアンギュレーション通貨換算レート
description-ja: 税が外貨建てで、トライアンギュレーション取引の場合の、換算レート。外貨をトライアンギュレーション通貨で割った値。

label: Tax Foreign to Triangulation Currency Exchange Rate Source
description: If the tax is in a foreign currency and triangulation is used, source of exchange rate - for example, Reuters, Bloomberg
label-ja: 税額外貨トライアンギュレーション通貨換算レート情報源
description-ja: 税が外貨建てで、トライアンギュレーション取引の場合の、換算レートの情報源。たとえば、Reuters, Bloomberg

label: Tax Foreign to Triangulation Currency Exchange Rate Type
description: If the tax is in a foreign currency and triangulation is used, type of exchange rate - for example, spot rate, forward contract etc.
label-ja: 税額外貨トライアンギュレーション通貨換算レート種別
description-ja: 税が外貨建てで、トライアンギュレーション取引の場合の、換算レートの種別。たとえば、スポット・レート、先物など。

label: Ticking Field
description: Signifies that an item has been cleared, finished, finalized. When checking accounts are called for, the tick or letter showing this was done appears in this field. Can also be used for identifying that the\noriginal document against which a payment or DR/CR memo applies has been reconciled.
description-ja: 項目が消去または完了されたことを示す。勘定のチェックが要求される場合、処理済を示すチェックマークまたは文字が指定される。支払またはDR/CRのメモに対する元文書が、消し込まれたことを確認するためにも使用可能。

label: Document Remaining Balance
description: Balance remaining on the document
description-ja: 文書上の残高。

label: UCR
description: Unique Consignment Reference or UCR. An "origin to destination" reference code for international consignments, developed in cooperation with the World Customs Organization and EAN International (EAN). (http://www.wcoomd.org/ie/EN/press/UCR_new_e.pdf)
description-ja: Unique Consignment ReferenceまたはUCR。国際委託販売のための"origin to destination"参照コード。World Customs OrganizationとEAN International (EAN)が共同で開発している。\n(http://www.wcoomd.org/ie/EN/press/UCR_new_e.pdf)

label: Originating Document  - Heading
description: A tool to capture the flow of related documents in the business process. Some needs of end users require a greater history of the documents that are associated with a transaction, especially in the VAT audit area. Contains a repetitive structure of related documents.
description-ja: 業務プロセス上の、関連文書の流れを捕捉するためのもの。特にVAT監査では、エンドユーザの要求として、取引に関係する文書の履歴が必要とされる。関連文書情報の構造の繰り返しを含む。

label: Originating Document Type
description: Originating document type - order, acknowledgement, confirmation, shipment, delivery/receipt, invoice, payment, etc.
